title: Combining Machine-Learning Assessment of Multiple MRI Pathologies and Clinical Phenotypes for Predicting Joint Replacement in Knee Osteoarthritis: Data From the Osteoarthritis Initiative.
abstract: ObjectiveArtificial intelligence offers opportunities for timesaving assessments of multiple pathologies in large magnetic resonance imaging (MRI) data sets in knee osteoarthritis (KOA). This study evaluated their prevalence within pre-defined clinical phenotypes and their predictive value for knee replacement (KR).DesignBaseline MRIs (
authors: D'Assignies, G; Demanse, D; Saxer, F; Laurent, D; Zille, P; Vesoul, T; Cordelle, P; Herpe, G; Conaghan, P G; Schieker, M
